name: economic-report-of-the-president-sentiment
description: ## Overview This repository contains raw economic reports of the president, along with a NodeJS script that converts these PDFs to images, then uses [Tessaract](https://www.npmjs.com/package/tesseract.js) to extract the text from these images. Finally, the script uses [Natural](https://naturalnode.github.io/natural/) to analyze the sentiment of the economic reports.
